user.title: WeatherDuino
user.description:
Enter the connection details of your WeatherDuino device.

**JSON path**:
- WeatherDuino 4Pro typically uses `/json`
- WeatherDisplay and some Air Quality devices may use `/` (leave empty to use `/`)

**Device type**:
- `auto` is recommended (detect by JSON keys)
- Use a fixed type only if detection fails.

error.invalid_input: Invalid input. Please check the values.

init.title: WeatherDuino Options
init.description:
Adjust polling and JSON endpoint settings.

Tip: Leave the path empty to use `/`.

If automatic detection fails, set **Device type** manually.
